concept.title: 5323.804-90 Contract Clauses

conbody.p: Include AFFARS clause 5352.223-9000 in all solicitations and contracts/orders unless the requiring activity obtains the approval IAW paragraph 5323.803(a). If approval is obtained, the contracting officer must instead use FAR clause 52.223-11.
